text: Mesiya (Yesu), mwene Mariyamu (Mariya), nta kindi yari cyo uretse ko yari intumwa y’Imana, kandi hari n’izindi ntumwa zahise mbere ye. Ndetse nanyina yari umunyakuri cyane (kuko yizeraga amagambo ya Allah). Bombi bararyaga (ibyo kurya nk’abandi bantu basanzwe, mu gihe Allah atajya arya). Reba uko tubasobanurira ibimenyetso, hanyuma unarebe uko (abantu) birengagiza (ukuri)
